title: This message is received after your program connects to IQConnect. It contains customer information. See Level 1 Port System Messages

IP.title: This is the IP address of the Quote server in use.

Port.title: This will be the port for the Quote server in use.

Version.title: Will be the most current version of the IQFeed Client.

VerboseExchanges.title: These are the exchanges in text that the customer will get in real-time.

MaxSymbols.title: This is the maximum number of symbols a user can watch at one time on the Level 1 port.

Flags.title: These are any special flags that may be in their account.

AccountExpirationDate.title: Date of account expiration (TRIAL CUSTOMERS ONLY).
